text: Charles Duncan Michener (September 22, 1918 - November 1, 2015) was an American entomologist. He was born in Pasadena, California. He was a leading expert on bees, his magnum opus being The Bees of the World. ==References== ==His books== * Michener, C. D. (1974). The Social Behavior of the Bees. Harvard University Press. 404 pp. * Michener, C. D. (2000). The Bees of the World.
